text: "The Trooper" is a 1983 song by English heavy metal band Iron Maiden and is the second single from their fourth studio album Piece of Mind. It went to number 12 in Ireland and the United Kingdom. In 2005 the live version of the song went to number 1 in Spain. It was taken from their live album Death on the Road. ==Track listings== ;7" & 12" Single ;2005 Enhanced CD ;2005 7" Blue Vinyl ;2005 12" Picture Disc Category:1983 songs Category:2005 songs Category:Iron Maiden songs Category:Heavy metal
title: The Trooper
